Name: Among Stars and Robots
About the game: Among Stars and Robots is a puzzle game where you control the robot Cubot with visual programming. Cubot needs to navigate the tricky terrain with its (somewhat limited) processing power. Use the commands at your disposal to design a loop of instructions that will help Cubot find its way to the exit!
